full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'DIR GDON BGEGS KYI GNOD PA DANG NAD KYIS GZIR PA RNAMS LA PHAN PA'I GTOR MA DANG GLUD RDZOGS BYA BA'I RIM PA NI, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI DAD PA DA DANG GTONG BA DANG RNAM DPYOD KYIS MDZES PA'I DPON MO BSTAN 'DZIN TSE DBANG RAB BRTAN GYI SKU RIM LA GTONG BA'I PHYIR DU DZA PA PAndI TA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS KYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE'O, ,)
